column3: While this seems to currently not cause any issues, it could do so in the future.  For instance, I'm working on some patches applied on top of Bitcoin Core.  That code [previously had a bug](https://github.com/xaya/xaya/blob/fcda6ade772455494f83b0a3c5605aec97a8991a/src/zmq/zmqgames.cpp#L278) where `cs_main` was not locked even though it should have been, but `AssertLockHeld` did not catch this.  A
